title: KK time to revert these nerfs.
body:
Several champions were pushed over the edge with the OP jungle items and they were nerfed into the ground because of it. Now the two problem items, devourer and cinderhulk have both been heavily nerfed. 

Time to revert these nerfs.

{{champion:10}}  5 AD removed because of her jungling power. Devourer itself is nerfed, in addition to ranged champions being less effective with devourer. Not only is she back to being a mediocre jungle pick that takes 20 minutes to have the slightest effect on the game, now lane Kayle is 5 AD weaker. 

{{champion:14}}  Too many nerfs to fit on this page...
{{champion:113}} Massive flail of the northern winds nerfs. 

I may be missing some, feel free to comment about it. Don't let Riot continue their trend of nerfing the fuck out of champions because of OP items, later nerfing the items, and leaving the champions they nerfed in the dust. 

Unrelated to the devourer and cinderhulk nerfs, but {{champion:9}}  has been suffering since the removal of magus, he doesn't have any use for runeglaive at all. Maybe revert his 700-650 tether range nerf if you aren't going to give us better AP machete options.

Then that's kinda a problem when someone can build full tank (with no damage) and still deal a lot of damage. That's unbalanced.

Kayle has some of the highest win rates in the game. 

Buff Kayle? More like gut Kayle, amirite?
Lane Kayle is undervalued AF, and people who think it needs buffs need to lane against one, she also does terrifyingly well against these juggernauts.

Honestly the only nerf I want reverted on Sion is the bonus damage when you're hit by a flying minion. The other nerf I think were actually deserved (the activation timer might have been a bit extreme, maybe half revert that, make it 2.5 seconds)
